start.title: Start
start.description: Perfect for businesses starting their online journey.

Basic.title: Basic
Basic.applicableFor: Small businesses needing a simple web presence.

features.feature7: Setup of one social media profile (Instagram or Facebook)

Advanced.title: Advanced
Advanced.applicableFor: Growing businesses that need a custom website.

features.feature1: Everything in the Basic tier included
features.feature2: Up to 5 pages with custom design
features.feature3: Enhanced SEO (keywords, internal links, alt texts)
features.feature4: Setup of two social media platforms
features.feature6: Professional logo design (multiple concepts and revisions)
features.feature7: Basic corporate identity design (colors, fonts, brand visuals)

features.feature1: Everything in the Advanced tier included
features.feature8: Complete corporate identity design with guidelines
features.feature9: Setup and branding of all relevant social media platforms

grow.title: Grow
grow.description: For businesses looking to expand their online reach.

Basic.title: Basic
Basic.applicableFor: Small businesses wanting to test online ads.

features.feature1: Google Ads campaign setup and management (1 campaign)
features.feature2: Meta Ads (Facebook/Instagram) setup and management (1 campaign)

features.feature1: Everything in the Basic tier included
features.feature7: 8 designed posts + 4 story posts per month

Custom.title: Custom
Custom.applicableFor: Companies needing a custom ad strategy.

features.feature1: Everything in the Advanced tier included
features.feature2: Omnichannel ad strategy (Google Search, Display, YouTube, Meta, TikTok Ads)
features.feature3: Retargeting funnel setup with custom audiences
features.feature4: Weekly reporting with ROI & strategy adjustments
features.feature5: Social media management for up to 3 platforms
features.feature6: Full video production support (script, edit, publish)*
features.feature7: Custom campaign assets (graphics & copy per promotion)
features.feature8: Strategic campaign calendar with seasonal campaigns

maintain.title: Maintain
maintain.description: For businesses needing long-term support & optimization.

features.feature3: Basic technical SEO check (speed, mobile, indexing)
features.feature5: Up to 1 small website edit per month

features.feature1: Everything in the Basic tier included
features.feature3: Up to 3 website edits per month
features.feature5: Page speed optimization (lazy loading, image compression)
features.feature6: Google Analytics report with key takeaways
features.feature7: Blog or page content refresh (1 item/month)

Custom.title: Custom
Custom.applicableFor: Companies with advanced SEO & maintenance needs.

features.feature1: Everything in the Advanced tier included
